p: The founder 22826 (Δ1 mutation) was also crossed with founder 25035, which carries a Δ15 deletion in exon 2 predicted to result in an in-frame loss of 5 amino acids. Serum analysis of Δ1/Δ15 F1 offspring revealed normal levels of IgM and IgG ( Table 2). Thus, the Δ15 mutation does not appear to affect functional IgM expression or B-cell development.
